duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the retail operation and front desk customer experience at the boutique.
Manage the store's merchandising, inventory, and sales to ensure consistent brand presentation and optimize customer engagement.
Engage with customers to address and resolve service-related issues and ensure customer satisfaction.
Analyze sales data, track KPIs, and develop strategies to enhance performance and identify opportunities for expansion.
Co-manage and organize all retail operations, demonstrating expertise in sales, merchandising, and customer engagement.
Communicate with the executive team and report to the Retail Operations Manager to present vision, ideas, and monthly performance metrics.
Lead and mentor the retail staff, ensuring their work aligns with the boutique's mission and goals.
Manage email communication with customers and ensure timely responses to inquiries and service-related issues.
Utilize technology such as Google Workspace, Shopify, Mariana Tek, Mindbody, Instagram, Monday.com, and Asana for efficient retail operations and customer engagement.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years of experience in retail, sales, or fitness
